frozen.name: linux-router
frozen.shortDescription: Set Linux as router / Wifi hotspot / proxy in one command
frozen.longDescription:
Features:

- Create a NATed sub-network
- Provide Internet
- DHCP server and RA
- DNS server
- IPv6 (behind NATed LAN, like IPv4)
- Creating Wifi hotspot:
  - Channel selecting
  - Choose encryptions: WPA2/WPA, WPA2, WPA, No encryption
  - Create AP on the same interface you are getting Internet (require same channel)
- Transparent proxy (redsocks)
- DNS proxy
- Compatible with NetworkManager (automatically set interface as unmanaged)
